amendment.description: To amend the resolving clause to eliminate the request the President invite the University of Virginia men's lacrosse team to the White House.

vote.text: Amendment SA 870 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 870 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S7559; text: CR S7559) To amend the resolving clause to eliminate the request the President invite the University of Virginia men's lacrosse team to the White House.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 870 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Allen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 870 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
